title: Ex-Governor KP Mehtab Abbasi, Senator Javed Abbasi call on PM
content:
ISLAMABAD, June 16 (APP): Former Governor and Chief Minister Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Sardar Mehtab Abbasi and Senator Javed Abbasi called on Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif here on Thursday.
Matters relating to the development of Galiyat areas were discussed in the meeting.
The Prime Minister said that the government will continue to play its role for the provision of health and education facilities as well as other projects of social development and peopleâ€™s welfare in Galiyat.
